title: CAA प्रदर्शन: लखनऊ में पुलिस लाठीचार्ज का वीडियो, अहमदाबाद पुलिस की बर्बरता के रूप में शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
#Lucknow Police lathi-charged people who gathered to protest against the Citizenship (Amendment) Act and the National Register of Citizens. #CAA_NRC #lucknowprotest pic.twitter.com/w0tKBQ9kGu

The Lucknow Police had to resort to lathicharge and use tear gas to disperse the crowd. Madheyganj and Sakhanda police outposts in the city were also vandalised by the mob. https://t.co/HkAcwhlEI8pic.twitter.com/kqWEvn4YMD
